casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Earl GOODE, Jr. No. 10A94-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2005. Diane Savage, for George Earl Goode, Jr. Barry S. McNeill, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2005 by Defendant to Extend Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (George Earl Goode, Jr.) shall have up to and including the 9th day of February 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2005."
